page.title: 05HOME LIFE IN CLAUGHTON
page.content: I WAKE UP ABOUT 7.45 A.M. I LISTEN TO THE TAPE_RECORDER OR READ A BOOK.I GET DRESSED,EAT MY BREAKFAST AND MAKE MY DINNER.I MAKE THE DRINK WITH A SODASTREAM DRINKS_MAKER.I WALK TO SCHOOL ABOUT HALF PAST EIGHT.I LIVE ACROSS THE ROAD AND IT TAKES ABOUT A MINUTE. MY FAVOURITE DAY IS WEDNESDAY BECAUSE WE DO GAMES IN THE AFTERNOON. IN THE MORNING WE DO MATHS,ENGLISH AND SOME T.V. WORK. AFTER SCHOOL I WALK HOME. AT 6.30 P.M. I GO TO THE YOUTH CLUB DOWN THE ROAD ON MY BIKE AND PLAY FOOTBALL AND THEN COME HOME AND GO TO BED.
